channel.title: The Happy blog
channel.description: This is a happy blog. This will dispense happiness as you stare in your screen for continuous 10 minutes. Believe me, Trump never lies and I never kid. And, I'm watching you.

item.title: Dawn of Productivity
item.description: Hi Stranger. It’s been quite sometime that I put something in here. So, I came up with this idea of self assessment. I’ll be putting up my daily productive work here as a post. That way, the site will not become rusty and it will also help me track what and how exactly I need to go with it. In between, I’ll also add some relevant and informative text about what I’ll be doing in the bounds of “productive work”. I’ll first start with 7 days demo to see how it goes. Hope I don’t miss any of the day and increase my productivity.

item.title: The First Post!
item.description: Hey! How are you? I just made my first jekyll blog :-).
